articles.title: Gold Demand Plunged to 11-year Low in 2020 as Virus Upended Trade: Report - News18
articles.description: Global demand for gold fell to its lowest in 11 years in 2020 as the coronavirus upended the market, triggering huge stockpiling by investors but collapsing sales of jewellery and purchases by central banks, an industry report said on Thursday.
